title: Tastes Like Burning
report: Made tea from 5 grams of voacanga africana root. I let it steep for an hour. Smells like ginseng, tastes fiery, awful.
2:30 - Mild stimulant effect, similar to caffeine. Not much else as far as I can tell.
5:00 - Still feel the effect. It's not a bad caffeine substitute if not for the flavour.

erowid.citation: Hempeater. "Tastes Like Burning: experience with Voacanaga africana (ID 70019)". Erowid.org. Jan 4, 2009. erowid.org/exp/70019
